post.author: 김태희
post.content:
Mobile Developers
About the Job
Immediate contract opportunity for Mobile Developers (Android, Brew, Blackberry, Java,, iPhone, Windows, Web 0S) based in Toronto.



The following is required:



Skills and Experience:




2+ years of development working with mobile devices
2+ years of experience architecting software for  Mobile Devices
5+ years of Software Engineering
Experience in one of the  following;  J2Me, Windows Mobile 6.1 and/or 6.5, Brew or Blackberry development
Also experience with either Android SDK, iPhone SDK, or Palm SDK would be advantageous
Experience using development IDEs, Netbeans,  Visual Studio
Clear understanding of difference between desktop and mobile development
Experience in WebServices, SOAP, XML



Responsibilities include:


Participating in Mobile platform development and porting
Participating in requirements and project scope discussions.
Participating in technical specifications development.

Education:  BS in Engineering or Science or equivalent experience

Please forward your resume in word format to info-tech@talgroup.net
post.title: Mobile Developers - Tal Group
